I am not able to reproduce this bug. It happened while I was using Eclipse.

I was using 3.1 when this bug was logged with all drivers/libs recommended for 3.1.

Now I am using 3.2M2 (with 3.1 drivers/libs) and not using VE any more.

Not sure how can I help you further. I thought the stack trace might give you
some clues.

Cheers and goodwill.

provide an example visual class if you run into this problem again.
Thanks...
